long_description: Sporty and comfortable, the Marin Fairfax SC4 bike offers an upright riding position and agile, speedy handling for everyday riding, such as commuting, fitness or errands. Upright positioning increases the rider's field of view and reduces strain on the hands, wrists and shoulders. Triple-butted, hydroformed aluminum frame and carbon-fiber fork work to optimize efficiency and ensure a comfortable, stable ride. Shimano Acera triple crankset and a 9-speed cassette provide 27 gears for handling everything from steep climbs to speedy pursuits. Shimano shifters and derailleurs move you smoothly from gear to gear; trigger shifters operate intuitively for simple shifts. Hydraulic disc brakes offer controlled deceleration even in wet weather. Continental Contact II road tires feature a puncture-resistant belt to deter flats. Saddle features gel inserts and is contoured for comfort. Platform pedals accommodate most shoes, and feature aluminum cages for efficient power transfer to pedals. Marin Fairfax SC4 bike specs are subject to change.
